resources.string: Special thanks to the CD\'s Directive
and to all of you, that helped develop this game during the years by playing and asking, creating a unique and funny game experience.

Caput Draconis

Are you still waiting for your letter? Thanks to BTH, you get the chance to experience in first person the world's most famous School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
For five days, BTH offers an immersive experience to its members: from a stay at a themed hotel to lessons to follow in the Great Hall, strictly in uniform!

This is an italian association.
For all info:

This is a reference app that contains the Harry Potter's spells used during the Duelists Club that takes place during the events organized by Caput Draconis. During the event the players challenge each other like in a LARP.

This app is thought to be consulted briefly before a duel and to give a document on which to study to prepare for the duels.

For any app-related issue, please contact:

Caput Draconis is not affiliated or endorsed by J. K. Rowling, Warner Bros. or Time Warner. Harry Potter and Related Publishing Rights © J. K. Rowling. Harry Potter characters, names and related indicia are trademarks of and © Warner Bros. Ent. All Rights Reserved.
